__This notebook contains the data pre-processing and data splitting procedures for the tree cover type data set.__

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(caret)
set.seed(0)
```

```{r}
df = read.csv("C:/Users/andre/OneDrive/Desktop/ADS503/covtype.csv")
head(df)
```

```{r}
str(df)
```

```{r}
# Remove features/predictors with no variance
zero_cols <- nearZeroVar(df)
Zero_covtype <- df[, -zero_cols]
```

```{r}
# Remvove highly correlated predictors
Covtype_HC <- findCorrelation(cor(Zero_covtype), cutoff = .8)
CovType <- Zero_covtype[, -Covtype_HC]
```


```{r}
# Split the data into 80% and 20%.
cov_train <- createDataPartition(zero_cols, p = .8, list = FALSE)
covtype_train <- CovType[cov_train, ]
covtype_test <- CovType[-cov_train, ]
```
